definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: Cut the remaining half chorizo and bacon into slices and lay them on top.
sentences.chinese: 餘下半份香腸和煙肉切片，鋪上表面。

sentences.english: She took a piece of bacon and ran out of the house.
sentences.chinese: 她採取了煙肉片斷並且用盡了房子。

sentences.english: Pan-fried bacon is crisp and not too salty.
sentences.chinese: 煙肉煎得鬆脆，味不太鹹。

sentences.english: Cut the bacon into small bites and chop the onion.
sentences.chinese: 把煙肉切成小片，洋蔥切碎。

sentences.english: Onion, bacon, ham, and parmesan cheese in a creamy sauce with egg yolk.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥，煙肉，火腿，帕瑪臣芝士及蛋黃奶油汁。

sentences.english: The saturated fat in bacon also contributes to cancer.
sentences.chinese: 在煙肉裏的飽和油脂也是可以致癌。

sentences.english: Would you like sausage, bacon or ham?
sentences.chinese: 您要香腸，煙肉還是火腿？

definition: katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
